input.sentences: this was a very scary place for me .
the columbarium was where funeral urns are stored .
we went inside the columbarium it was dark and cold inside .
i could not wait to get out | i thought a ghost might be in there !
even this statue was a little startling .
output.sentences: We walked down a scary path.
We saw urns stored near a funeral.
Inside the columbarium, it was dark.
We waited around, hoping for a ghost.
We didn't see a ghost, but we did see a startling statue.
